query.title: Query
query.description: The SQL query used to write or to subscribe

queryValues.title: Query values
queryValues.description: The SQL query values used to bulk insert

interval.title: Query interval
interval.description: The amount of milliseconds between queries. Only required when subscribing

cronExpression.title: Cron expression
cronExpression.description: The Cron expression used to poll the endpoint. (For examples, see: https://github.com/node-cron/node-cron)
